title: 05/17/2021 - HOUR 1 - Clippers, Curry, Rodgers
itunes:title: 05/17/2021 - HOUR 1 - Clippers, Curry, Rodgers
description:
The Clippers did their best to avoid the Lakers

Steph Curry is the greatest shooter of all time

For some reason teams will avoid Aaron Rodgers next season


Guest: Chris Broussard

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
